betterquesting:10.desc:8:
You're eager to dive into this new field of study, but your mentor cautions you to be a bit more patient. Just a bit. Alongside the untapped potential you call Vis there exists two forms of power that, left unchecked, will devour you body and soul - Taint and Warp. Taint is an aspect of magic you haven't gotten to yet, so your mentor merely says he'll discuss that later.

Warp is a corruption that occurs when Thaumaturges learn to recognize what exists beyond the worlds they know, the patterns that spell out the space between the portals you've used, or are attacked by those from there. Warp serves to draw you to that space, to confront it in it's own lair... though for what reason your mentor doesn't say.

Noticing that, for someone who clearly has all of this forbidden knowledge, you mentor seems perfectly sane. So you have to assume there are ways to overcome Warp. Your mentor nods, and promises that when your apprenticeship with him is over, you will be ready to enter that confrontation.

And, if you succeed, you will find a way to silence the voices forever. As he did.

Warp Theory adds a bunch of new Warp Effects to the Player. Keep an eye on it, because you don't want to spawn a Wither in your base.

5 warp: Message
10 warp: Fake Explosion
15 warp: Coin, Pumpkin
20 warp: Lay Eggs, Spawn Phantoms
25 warp: Fake Creeper, Fake Rain
30 warp: GregTech Fake Sounds, Spawn Bats
35 warp: Blood, Fake Enderman
40 warp: Spawn Friendly Creeper
45 warp: Jump Boost, Nausea
50 warp: Insomnia, Vis Drain
55 warp: Thunderstorm
60 warp: Spawn Fire Bats
65 warp: Blindness, Poison
70 warp: Livestock Rain
75 warp: Spawn Doppelganger
80 warp: Spawn Endermen, Wither Potion
85 warp: Wind
90 warp: Ender Pearl
95 warp: Blaze Fireball
100 warp: Litmus Paper, Junk
110 warp: Obsidian
120 warp: Lightning
125 warp: Inventory Swap
130 warp: Random Teleport
140 warp: Acceleration
150 warp: Fake Wither, Inventory Scramble
160 warp: Countdown Bomb
170 warp: Mushrooms
175 warp: Snow
180 warp: Decay
190 warp: Swamp
200 warp: Spawn Wither

Â§3A Voiding Drop Filter, for which there is a quest in the LV tab, is an eggcellent solution for some of the eary warp effects.
